      • createActor

        public static com.badlogic.ashley.core.Entity createActor(Box2DSystem box2DSystem,
                                          float width,
                                          float height,
                                          java.util.List<com.badlogic.ashley.core.Component> components)
        Creates a rectangular Box2D Entity of width, height with a wheel as it's base
        Parameters:
        box2DSystem - the Box2DSystem with the Box2D World to add the Body to
        width - full width of the body
        height - full height of the body
        components - List of Components to add to the entity
        Returns:
        the created Entity

      • createEntity

        public static com.badlogic.ashley.core.Entity createEntity(Box2DSystem box2DSystem,
                                           MeshData meshData,
                                           java.util.List<com.badlogic.ashley.core.Component> components)
        Creates an new Entity based on the follow:
        Parameters:
        box2DSystem - the Box2DSystem with the Box2D World to add the Body to
        meshData - MeshData object to load from
        components - List of Components to add to the entity
        Returns:
        the created Entity
